Hi,

I am hiring manager at Tapjoy, our team focuses on building and optimizing core parts of our architecture to manage costs of scaling, breaking off components of a legacy monolithic server into services in more efficient languages, and we argue over the correct tool for the job.

We are relatively small engineering team (managing around 30 billion requests per month).

we are looking for a senior engineer who is a team player, excited about the problem space, excited about exploring new solutions, interested in application design.
